FrontEnd

Class Assets

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrontEnd.Assets

  • public class Assets
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to cache assets and control reading image files. improves loading times as images are loaded only when they are first needed.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Christian Sanger
